nodes.text: Faos Station was a civilian space station. In 1 BBY, an Imperial freighter carrying a large kyber crystal, posing as a standard civilian freighter, was infiltrated by rebels Saw Gerrera, Ezra Bridger, Sabine Wren, and Chopper during a brief stop at Faos Station.

The station was originally going to be named Taos Station. The name change came too late to alter the surface texture of the model seen in Saw Gerrera's hologram, which has the name "TAOS" printed in Aurebesh on its surface.
